decks.notes: The key concept of this deck is to create a fast and aggressive strategy using Eldrazi creatures to overwhelm the opponent. By utilizing mana acceleration from lands like Eldrazi Temple and the Urza lands, as well as powerful creatures like Reality Smasher and Thought-Knot Seer, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while applying pressure. Chalice of the Void helps to control the opponent's spells, while cards like Walking Ballista and Dismember provide removal options. Overall, the deck focuses on efficiency and tempo to secure a quick victory.

The main concept of this deck is to disrupt your opponent's mana base while applying pressure with aggressive creatures. By utilizing cards like Leonin Arbiter and Aether Vial to tax your opponent's resources and slow them down, you can take control of the game and disrupt their game plan. Cards like Eldrazi Displacer and Tidehollow Sculler allow you to manipulate the board and disrupt your opponent's hand, while Thalia, Guardian of Thraben makes it harder for them to cast their spells. Overall, this deck aims to control the game while applying pressure and disrupting your opponent's strategy.

The main focus of the deck is to rapidly gain life through Martyr of Sands and gain advantage by using the life total to control the board with cards like Ghostly Prison and Serra Ascendant. The deck also utilizes cards like Ranger of Eos and Squadron Hawk to maintain card advantage and control the board with creatures like Elspeth, Sun's Champion and Wrath of God. The land base supports the strategy by including cards like Emeria, the Sky Ruin and Field of Ruin to ensure a steady stream of threats and removal.

This deck focuses on using powerful red control cards to disrupt the opponent while also deploying big threats like Chandra, Stormbreath Dragon, and Hazoret the Fervent to finish the game quickly. The main strategy involves using removal spells like Lightning Bolt and Skred to control the board, while also utilizing Blood Moon to disrupt the opponent's mana base. The deck aims to maintain card advantage with cards like Mind Stone and Relic of Progenitus, while also having efficient threats like Eternal Scourge and Pia and Kiran Nalaar to pressure the opponent.

The main concept of the deck is to disrupt opponent's mana base with land destruction spells like Stone Rain and Molten Rain while ramping up your own mana with Utopia Sprawl. Blood Moon also helps to disrupt opponents' mana base while providing additional land destruction. The deck also includes efficient threats like Tireless Tracker, Bloodbraid Elf, and Inferno Titan to pressure opponents. Chandra, Torch of Defiance provides card advantage and additional removal. The deck aims to control the game with a combination of disruption, mana acceleration, and powerful threats.

The deck focuses on controlling the game through counterspells, removal spells, and card advantage while ramping up mana with search spells and acceleration to eventually win the game with a Scapeshift combo. The goal is to delay the opponent's threats, ramp up mana quickly to cast powerful spells like Bring to Light, and then use Scapeshift to sacrifice lands and deal a lethal amount of damage to the opponent. The deck also utilizes cards like Snapcaster Mage and Jace, the Mind Sculptor for additional value and control.

The main focus of this Modern 1 vs 1 UrzaTron Control deck is to assemble Urza's Tower, Mine, and Power Plant to generate a massive amount of mana quickly. The deck includes versatile control elements such as counterspells, removal, and board wipes to disrupt opponents while setting up its own win conditions, like Mindslaver lock or powerful creatures like Wurmcoil Engine and Platinum Angel. The deck also utilizes card advantage through card draw spells and tutors to find key pieces of its strategy. The deck aims to control the game and outvalue opponents with its powerful late-game threats.

The main concept of this combo Elves deck is to quickly overrun your opponent with a swarm of Elves, utilizing cards like Heritage Druid and Elvish Archdruid to generate massive amounts of mana, then using Ezuri, Renegade Leader to pump your creatures and finish off your opponent. Lead the Stampede and Collected Company help you dig for more Elves to flood the board, while Shaman of the Pack provides a direct damage win condition. This deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and powerful Elf tribal strategy.

This Modern deck focuses on quickly filling the graveyard with cards like Burning Inquiry and Faithless Looting to bring out powerful threats like Hollow One and Gurmag Angler early in the game. By utilizing cards such as Flamewake Phoenix and Bloodghast that can be easily recurred from the graveyard, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and burn spells like Lightning Bolt. The mana base is streamlined to ensure consistency in casting spells, making this deck a fast and efficient Aggro deck that can quickly close out games.

The deck focuses on generating mana efficiently through cards like Pyretic Ritual and Baral, Chief of Compliance to quickly cast spells like Gifts Ungiven and Desperate Ritual. It utilizes cards like Manamorphose and Sleight of Hand to dig for key combo pieces like Grapeshot and Past in Flames. With the help of Goblin Electromancer, the deck can cast multiple spells in a single turn to burn the opponent out with a massive storm count. The deck aims to chain together multiple spells in a single turn to overwhelm the opponent and win the game in one explosive turn.

This deck aims to aggressively control the board while utilizing Death's Shadow as a powerful threat. By utilizing cards like Thoughtseize, Inquisition of Kozilek, and Fatal Push to disrupt the opponent's game plan, while also using Mishra's Bauble and Street Wraith to lower your own life total and pump up Death's Shadow. The deck also includes cards like Tarmogoyf and Grim Flayer to apply additional pressure and close out the game quickly. It's all about being efficient in removing threats and deploying your own to win the game as fast as possible.

This deck revolves around controlling the game by disrupting opponents' mana base with cards like Spreading Seas and Field of Ruin, while also utilizing powerful control spells like Cryptic Command and Path to Exile to remove threats. The deck also includes versatile creatures like Restoration Angel and Vendilion Clique to apply pressure and keep the opponent in check. The deck aims to stabilize the board and outvalue the opponent through card advantage and efficient removal spells, ultimately winning the game through attrition and incremental advantage.

The deck focuses on ramping up mana quickly and efficiently to eventually cast Scapeshift or Primeval Titan to trigger Valakut, the Molten Pinnacle multiple times in one turn, dealing massive amounts of direct damage to the opponent. Using cards like Sakura-Tribe Elder and Farseek to accelerate mana development, along with cards like Oracle of Mul Daya and Bloodbraid Elf for card advantage, the deck aims to assemble its combo pieces as fast as possible to win the game through overwhelming burst damage.

The primary focus of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and aggressive goblin tribal strategy. By playing low-cost goblin creatures and utilizing burn spells like Lightning Bolt and Goblin Grenade, the deck aims to quickly reduce the opponent's life total and secure a fast victory. Cards like Burning-Tree Emissary and Reckless Bushwhacker allow for explosive plays, while cards like Legion Loyalist and Foundry Street Denizen boost the power of the goblin creatures. Overall, the deck's key concept revolves around swiftly attacking and putting pressure on the opponent to win the game.

The deck focuses on using aggressive Eldrazi creatures and ramp spells to quickly overwhelm the opponent. The strategy is to play powerful threats like Reality Smasher and Thought-Knot Seer early in the game, backed up by efficient removal like Dismember and Lightning Bolt. The deck also includes cards like Ancient Stirrings to help find key pieces and accelerate the game plan. With a mix of ramp, disruption, and aggressive creatures, the deck aims to apply consistent pressure and close out games quickly.

The deck focuses on utilizing the cards Ad Nauseam and Angel's Grace to draw and play your entire deck in one turn, in combination with Phyrexian Unlife to prevent yourself from losing the game due to life loss. The win condition is to either play Laboratory Maniac and draw a card to win the game, or use Lightning Storm to deal lethal damage to your opponent. The deck also includes various mana ramp cards like Lotus Bloom and Pentad Prism to help you cast your combo pieces faster.
